title: Treasury Asks Congress for More Authorities to Go After Illicit Actors in Digital Asset Space
description: The U.S. deputy secretary of the Treasury has revealed that the Treasury Department has asked Congress for more tools and authorities “to go after illicit actors in the digital asset space.” Moreover, he stressed: “We need to update our illicit finance authorities to match the challenges we face today, including those presented by the evolving […]

title: Mysterious Bitcoin whale sparks speculations with over $450M in a wallet- Who is it?
description: Shrouded in secrecy and speculation, a mysterious Bitcoin whale has emerged with a wallet boasting an astonishing sum exceeding $450 million in Bitcoin holdings. The identity of this elusive figure remains veiled in mystery, prompting widespread curiosity and conjecture within the digital currency ecosystem. Who is behind this substantial accumulation of Bitcoin, and what motivations ... Read more
